author: Special Correspondent
text: The Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association has welcomed the state government’s decision to allot Rs.150 crore for skill development training in its interim Budget for 2016-17. In a statement issued here, N.Kanagasabapathy, president, TIDITISSIA, also welcomed the move to promote a heavy engineering component hub at Ponneri in Tiruvallur district at a cost of Rs.700 crore and a polymer industries park at an investment of Rs.264 crore.
title: TIDITISSIA hails interim budget
